definitions.title: n.[m.] thicket, covert, lair
definitions.body: ;—only sf. [[סֻכּוֹ]] Je 25:38 lair of ´[[י]], under fig. of lion (but Gie [[סֻבְּכוֹ]] cf. Je 4:7), [[סֻכּׂה]] Ps 10:9 of lion (sim. of wicked; Bae [[סֻכָּה]]; Lag Che We [[סֻבְּכוֹ]]); [[סוּכּוֹ]] Ps 76:3 his covert (of ´[[י]] under fig. of lion; ‖[[מְעוֹנׇתוֹ]]); for [[סֻכּׂה]] in his covert Ps 27:5 Qr rd. perh., with Kt [[סֻכָּה]] a booth (Ol Hup-Now Bae cf. Ps 31:21).
